div.h1: Welcome to the New Paltz Central School District

strong.span: Viewing Our Website On a Mobile Device

a.title: Go to comments for Viewing Website on Mobile Device

span.p: The New Paltz Central School District exists for the children of the community. The focus of its programs and activities is the commitment to measured excellence and continuous growth and development for all.

a.title: Go to comments for Mission Statement

p.br:
Focus on learning and success for all
Create a cohesive and inclusive culture K-12, across buildings and departments
Empower and create success for disengaged and disenfranchised students

a.title: Go to comments for Guiding Principles
Go to comments for Documents

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Quick Tip

p.a: Use this link to submit an anonymous tip.
Click here for more information about this reporting tool.

a.title: Go to comments for Anonymous Reporting

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: The District condemns and prohibits all forms of discrimination and harassment based on actual or perceived race, color, weight, national origin, ethnic group, religion, religious practice, disability, sexual orientation, gender or sex.If you believe that you have been discriminated against, you may make a claim that your rights have been denied. This claim or grievance may be filed with the Director ofStudent Support Services Title IX Officer: New Paltz Central School District, 196 Main Street, New Paltz, NY, 12561, (845) 256-4046

a.title: Budget Information
District Sports

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

Go to comments for Project overview

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: Click on the link above for more information

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Information

strong.span: New Paltz Community Foundation - Project Help your Neighbors 2020

span.p: NPCF has developed a plan to help citizens in need of a meal and simultaneously support local businesses to help them remain open or avoid staff cutbacks.
Click here to read the letter (Spanish version)

a.title: Go to comments for New Paltz Community Foundation

p.a: Click here to read the letter from the superintendent.

a.title: Go to comments for On "Grading" During "Remote Learning"

span.strong: New York State of Health - Health Insurance Information

span.a: Click here for more information about a Special Enrollment Period for people who are uninsured.

a.title: Go to comments for New York State of Health - Health Insurance Information

span.p: Please complete this survey ONLY if you have no device (other than a cell phone) and no internet connection in your household.

a.title: Go to comments for Distance Learning Survey

span.strong: The District is currently conducting a search for a new Superintendent of Schools.

a.title: Go to comments for Superintendent Search
Go to comments for School Safety Info Follow Up

span.strong: Resources for HelpingStudents Deal with Grief and Trauma

li.a: Ways to Care for Yourself after a Traumatic Event
After a Traumatic Event: What Teens Can Do
Advice to Partners and Friends of Survivors of Critical Incident Stress
Additional local resources and support information

a.title: Go to comments for Resources for Helping Students Deal with Grief and Trauma

strong.span: Resolution Regarding the Immigration Status of Students

a.title: Go to comments for Resolution Regarding the Immigration Status of Students

span.strong: Resolucin sobre el estatus migratorio de los estudiantes

a.title: Go to comments for Resolucin sobre el estatus migratorio de los estudiantes

span.p: If you have a question or concern, we want to hear from you. However, to ensure efficiency and accuracy, it is important that the correct people within the District are contacted. (Click for more information)

a.title: Go to comments for Need Information?

span.p: If you send an email to someone in the District and do not receive a response, please call the party to whom you addressed the email.

a.title: Go to comments for Emails to the District

strong.span: 2020 Annual Budget Vote and Election postponed until at least June 1, 2020, as per Governor Cuomo's Executive Order No. 202.13.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 Annual Budget Vote and Election Postponed

span.strong: The Community Budget Forum scheduled for March 18 is cancelled.

span.p: For budget details and to learn how you can offer your feedback, CLICK HERE.
